pages.text: 1. Use Telescope to find solar bodies and collect initial data.$(br)
2.Place Mission Control Station next to Telescope. So Telescope will upload observation data into MCS.$(br)
3. Install launching pad near by MCS. MCS has to be connected to launching pad.
4. Craft and place Satellite Rocket on launching pad. Supply fuel.$(br)5. In MCS GUI select the mission you want to start and activate it.$(br)
5. Wait until mission will be completed. Analyze completed missions data in MCS GUI
